content: @Oliver Bertuch @Dorothea Iglezakis do we want to talk any more about PR #11087 here? I pulled it out of QA in case we want more changes. Oliver had some thoughts, at least.

@Oliver Bertuch did you see the questions @Dorothea Iglezakis asked you at https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/11087#issuecomment-2772327251 ?

I'm just trying to keep things moving! :sweat_smile:

From my perspective, CodeMeta is still flagged as experimental in the guides and we don't load it for new installations. So, I'd say it's safe to merge #11087. It's an incremental improvement. After merging we could always iterate on it further if someone has time to make a PR before the 6.7 release.
@Dorothea Iglezakis @Oliver Bertuch are you ok with bumping the milestone for #11087 from 6.7 to 6.8? (Or removing the milestone altogether if that makes more sense.)
